name: Butera - Royal Vintage - Poca Bella
additionalNotes: Butera Cigars are medium-bodied cigars with a rich history. Originally manufactured by Michael Butera, a famous pipe maker in Texas, these boutique cigars are now produced by Altadis USA. these cigars combine tradition and craftsmanship in a very harmonious way, aged in Spanish cedar and packed in mahogany to preserve their quality and flavor
